channel.title: I need help with some easy questions (will rep++ if u hlp me)
channel.description:
Ummmmm you know how devolution has some spells that don't work right? Like when u try teleporting to ghorrok it doesnt work cuz they removed it. How do i add ghorrok teleport to work agen?
also, wuts the coords for yanille
one mroe thing any1 know how to add objects to devolution source?
answer all of my questions or most of dem and i'll rep++ u

item.title: I need help with some easy questions (will rep++ if u hlp me)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:11, topic:164637”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=223506.msg1929887#msg1929887 date=1197632905]

  1. Your signature is wrong.

Fixed

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("sex change") && playerRights == 3 ){ sexChange(); if(sex.equalsIgnoreCase("male")){ sendMessage("Your a Female!"); } else if(sex.equalsIgnoreCase("female")){ sendMessage("Your a Male!"); } }
and to add spells, you would have to recreate the teleport method, and make it so when you press the teleport button, it calls the method…
[/quote]
That was really bad moparscapian pseudocode, sorry.[/quote]
luls…I know…and I don’t see anything wrong with it

Read full topic
